dataset_info.description: Consumer financial complaints dataset with detailed complaint information and company responses

fields.description: Date when the complaint was received by the consumer protection agency
Primary financial product category (e.g., 'Student loan', 'Credit card', 'Mortgage')
Specific subcategory of the financial product (e.g., 'Federal student loan servicing', 'Private student loan')
Main category of the consumer's complaint (e.g., 'Dealing with your lender or servicer', 'Improper use of your report')
Specific subcategory of the issue (e.g., 'Trouble with how payments are being handled', 'Received bad information about your loan')
Detailed description of the complaint written by the consumer (may contain redacted information marked with X's)
Public response from the company (often 'None' or brief explanations)
Name of the financial institution/company being complained about (e.g., 'Nelnet, Inc.', 'MOHELA')
U.S. state abbreviation where the consumer is located
Consumer's ZIP code (may be partially redacted with X's for privacy)
Special consumer categories or tags (e.g., 'Older American', 'Servicemember', or 'None')
Indicates if consumer gave consent to publish their complaint ('Consent provided', 'Consent not provided')
Method used to submit the complaint (e.g., 'Web', 'Phone', 'Referral')
Date the complaint was forwarded to the company for response
Type of response from company (e.g., 'Closed with explanation', 'Closed with relief')
Whether company responded within required timeframe ('Yes', 'No')
Whether consumer disputed the company's response ('Yes', 'No', 'N/A')
Unique identifier for each complaint record

notes: Personal information is redacted with X's for privacy protection
Most complaints in this sample relate to student loan servicing issues
Many fields can contain 'None' or 'N/A' values when not applicable
